titles.title: A bill for the relief of Ricke Kaname Fujino of Honolulu, Hawaii.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 1/24/2005--Introduced. Mandates payment of a specified sum to Ricke Kaname Fujino in full satisfaction of all of his claims against the United States for the taking of his property pursuant to a specified order issued under the Trading with the Enemy Act on December 3, 1943.
